Coffee Piano - Your Portable Piano Practice Partner

Experience the art of piano in a uniquely interactive, caf√©-inspired environment with Coffee Piano. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced player, Coffee Piano provides an intuitive and inspiring platform to learn, practice, and compose beautiful music.

Realistic Piano Sounds with Touch Sensitivity:
Experience authentic grand piano and Rhodes sounds, enhanced with touch-sensitive keys and sustain pedal support for a more immersive and expressive play.

Unlimited Chord Progression Generation:
Generate unlimited chord progressions, from simple triads to complex 7th and extended chords, including popular combinations and cadences.

Advanced Chord Progression Generator:
Effortlessly arrange chords with drag-and-drop functionality. Visualize your progressions with detailed mini piano diagrams for each progression, making it especially helpful for beginners.

Comprehensive Chord & Scale Library:
Explore an extensive library of chords and scales, including inversions, with interactive visuals on the piano to support your musical journey.

Recording, Playback & Download:
Capture your practice sessions for review, and save your chord progressions in text format, perfect for sharing or later reference.

12 Customizable Accompaniment Rhythms:
Enhance your practice with rhythms across genres like jazz, lo-fi, rock, and electronic, designed to complement your style and boost creativity.

Scale Degree Visualization:
Visualize scale degrees in the chosen key across all levels of chord progressions to enhance your understanding of music theory.

Customizable Background Colors:
Create a cozy practice atmosphere by customizing your Coffee Piano background with colors that suit your vibe.

Choice of Key and Number of Bars for Chord Progression:
Select the key and the number of bars to tailor your chord progressions to your preferences.

Drag-and-Drop Functionality:
Easily rearrange your chord progressions with intuitive drag-and-drop features.

Access to a Full Chord Library:
Browse through a complete range of chords, from basic to extended, with inversions available for a richer musical palette.

Visualization of Complete Range of Scales:
Explore and visualize various scales on the piano to support your composition and improvisation efforts.

Mini Piano Diagrams for Progressions:
Utilize mini piano diagrams to understand chord positions and progressions better.

Copy Feature for Quick Saving or Sharing:
Quickly copy your generated progressions for easy saving or sharing with others.

Customizable Themes:
Tailor your piano theme to match your personal style and preferences.

Designed for All Levels:
Coffee Piano is suitable for beginners and experienced musicians alike, providing tools to foster creativity and exploration.

Whether you're practicing, composing, or simply unwinding with music, Coffee Piano is designed to be your personal, portable music studio, fostering creativity and exploration in your musical journey.
